auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

auth.title: SmartAgent Hub
auth.subtitle: Connect to your AI agents workspace

dashboard.title: SmartAgent Hub
dashboard.welcomeDesc: Select an agent from the sidebar or create a new conversation to get started.
dashboard.noConversationDesc: Select a conversation or create a new one.

chat.sendHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, I'm experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later.

general: Ask for help choosing the right agent
support: Ask for help using a service
sales: Ask for information about our products

settings.title: Settings
settings.themeDesc: Choose between light and dark mode

chiefAgent: I understand your request. Let me analyze this and redirect to the right specialized agent.
Perfect! I'll process your request and connect you with the appropriate expert.
Thank you for your message. I'll coordinate with the team to provide you with the best response.
supportAgent: I'm here to help you with your technical issue. Can you give me more details?
Thank you for contacting me. I'll examine your support request immediately.
I understand your problem. Here are some steps we can try together.
salesAgent: Excellent! I'd be delighted to help you with your business needs. Let's talk about your goals.
Thank you for your interest. I'll present our best solutions tailored to your situation.
It's wonderful that you're contacting us. Let's explore opportunities for your business together.
marketingAgent: Interesting! I can help you develop an effective marketing strategy. What are your current challenges?
Perfect timing! Marketing is crucial for growth. Let's discuss your communication goals.
I specialize in innovative marketing strategies. How can I help you achieve your objectives?
